title: Practice Challenge
description: Build a social media post layout: 1. Top row: profile photo + name 2. Middle: post text 3. Bottom row: like button + comment button + share button Use Column for vertical arrangement, Row for horizontal. ---
instructions: Build a social media post layout: 1. Top row: profile photo + name 2. Middle: post text 3. Bottom row: like button + comment button + share button Use Column for vertical arrangement, Row for horizontal. ---

testCases.description: Top row contains profile photo and name
testCases.expectedOutput: Row with CircleAvatar and Text for name visible
Like, Comment, Share buttons in Row with spaceAround alignment
Main Column contains profile Row, post Text, and buttons Row

hints.text: Use Row for horizontal layouts, Column for vertical

commonMistakes.mistake: Nesting Row inside Row instead of Column
commonMistakes.consequence: Elements stacked horizontally instead of vertically
commonMistakes.correction: Use Column as the outer container for vertical sections
Use exact case: main not Main, print not Print
